mapper.select: select a.id AS "id", a.access_token AS "accessToken", a.expires_in AS "expiresIn", a.expires_after AS "expiresAfter" from we_accesstoken a
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO we_accesstoken( id, access_token, expires_in, expires_after ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{accessToken}, #{expiresIn}, #{expiresAfter} )
